channel.title: Academic Research on Ponte Posterum
channel.description: Recent content in Academic Research on Ponte Posterum

item.title: Res701 0
item.description: Research 701 ~ Day 1 Res701 is another required class for my bachelor of IT course. This class is based around academic research, where we look at/review academic papers/research methodologies and write blogs about them. Blogs have never been my strong point so I am going to put 110% effort into ensuring consistentcy for this class. I already know what area I am going to be focusing on (data science, machine learning and deep learning), so in that regard I am already ahead of the curve.
